posts.title: Wrap up round 2022.2
posts.html:
Congrats to Zelkova for winning the round with a total score of 8,030.2! In total 73 people participated in this round for a total score of 42,957.9!

One user had an entry deleted because of bad sportsmanship. Please don't log two weeks worth of pages just before the contest ends. Repeat offenders will be banned from participating.

posts.title: Wrap up round 2021.5
posts.html:
Congrats to Jazzy for winning the round with a total score of 9213! In total 79 people participated in this round for a total score of 78,370.53.

Japanese 76 readers
English 2 readers
French 2 readers
Portuguese 1 reader
Chinese 1 reader
Hebrew 1 reader
Italian 1 reader
German 1 reader

I also want to remind everyone to log their pages frequently. This is the first time I've had to remove people and edit logs manually in order to keep things fair for everyone. Don't dump a weeks worth of reading all at once, that kind of behavior is not healthy for the contest. Especially if you're a fast reader you should be logging your pages frequently. Updates of 1000+ pages after days/weeks of silence is demotivating for other participants. From here on out I'll be removing those who dump massive updates infrequently.

Thank you all for participating!
